title: Bug 23331[Editor Mgmt] Pinned editors not restored as pinned
description: Bug 23331[Editor Mgmt] Pinned editors not restored as pinned They had previously been pinned whenI shut down the workbench.
OB: When I started up the workbench, four editors that I had previously openedwere restored, but they were not pinned.
SR: When I started up the workbench, four editors that I had previously openedwere restored, but they were not pinned.
